attr.title: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead
attr.desc: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead is a turn-based survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Struggle to survive in a harsh, persistent, procedurally generated world. Scavenge the remnants of a dead civilization for food, equipment, or, if you are lucky, a vehicle with a full tank of gas to get you the hell out of Dodge. Fight to defeat or escape from a wide variety of powerful monstrosities, from zombies to giant insects to killer robots and things far stranger and deadlier, and against the others like yourself, that want what you haveâ€¦
attr.inst: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead has a very complex control scheme. Make sure to read the control section either on the Wiki or in the README file inside cataclysm-dda folder.
